title: Recovering from a coronary
creator_contributor_role: New Zealand National Film Unit, production company

description: Demonstrates a practical rehabilitation program for patients with coronary heart disease (devised at Otago University Medical School and the New Zealand School of Physiotherapy) which has produced encouraging results. Although intended mainly for medical audiences, the film offers advice which would well help to avoid or delay the premature onset of coronary heart disease in the population as a whole.
